content: This article **is an orphan, as no other articles link to it**. Please introduce links to this page from related articles. *(December 2025)* **TM Asia Life** is a [general](/wiki/General_insurance) and [life insurance](/wiki/Life_insurance) company. It has offices in [Malaysia](/wiki/Malaysia), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) and [Brunei](/wiki/Brunei). The company's insurance plans include i-intellectual, a regular premium [investment-linked policy](/wiki/Investment-linked_policy); and TM Legacy Plus, a limited-payment [whole life policy](/wiki/Whole_life_policy) which has a minimum benefit feature that increases a policy's sum assured depending on the entry age of the policyholder. - Company website This [Singaporean corporation or company](/wiki/List_of_companies_of_Singapore) article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: TM Asia Life
